More...

Here is a little more information about the concepts used in the application and links for resources related to building the architecture.

 
Azure AppService
AppService WebApp Linux web application used to host the Docker image as a web application.
Azure Functions
  • Function App for API call(s) written in C#
  • Proxies for alias of API Definition file (swagger.json) from hash value to http://superhero-api.azurewebsites.net/docs/swagger.json
  • API Definition (preview) to create the specification
OpenAPI (Swagger)
Used base Docker image & Swagger UI base template for customization.
Docker
Create Docker image for custom API documentation / implementation of Swagger UI and uploaded to Docker Hub.
